movies.title: Musique de mon coeur
movies.originalTitle: Mein ganzes Herz ist voll Musik

biography.bio: Erika Köth was born on September 15, 1925 in Darmstadt, Germany. She was an actress, known for Der Barbier von Sevilla (1959), Musique de mon coeur (1959) and Die heimliche Ehe (1968). She was married to Ernst Dorn. She died on February 20, 1989 in Speyer, Rhineland-Palatinate, West Germany.
biography.name: Erika Köth

biography.bio: Wolf Albach-Retty (1906-1967) was one of those actors full of charm, presence and wit the Ausrian and German cinema of yore knew the secret for. That he became an actor comes as no surprise considering that his mother, Rosa Albach-Retty, was a star of the Viennese stage. Of course, Magda Schneider, the woman he married in 1936, was an actress. And logically indeed they begot another famous actress by the name of ... Romy Schneider. Unfortunately, being Romy's father is probably Wolf Albach-Retty's greatest claim for glory, for despite his acting talents he privileged - lock, stock and barrel - commercial cinema, opting for romance films, superficial musicals and mediocre comedies which pleased the crowds but did not make film history. Too bad because his acting talents would have been welcome in the world of Max Ophüls, Wolfgang Liebeneiner or Helmut Käutner, among others. His theater career was much more satisfactory, notably his acclaimed performances in plays by Athur Schnitler.
biography.name: Wolf Albach-Retty

biography.bio: Maria Sebaldt was born on April 26, 1930 in Berlin-Steglitz, Germany. She is an actress, known for Die Wicherts von nebenan (1986), Gewagtes Spiel (1964) and Fais ta valise Sherlock Holmes (1960). She was previously married to Robert Freitag.
biography.name: Maria Sebaldt

biography.placeOfBirth: Krumau, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary [now Cesky Krumlov, Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Ernst Waldbrunn was born on August 14, 1907 in Krumau, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary as Ernest Karl Anton Waldbrunn. He was an actor and writer, known for Die Flucht (1966), Lauter liebe Leute (1972) and Johanna geht... (1968). He was married to Elfriede Ott. He died on December 22, 1977 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Ernst Waldbrunn

biography.bio: Elke Aberle was born on July 1, 1950 in Neuss, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. She is an actress, known for Je veux seulement que vous m'aimiez (1976), Betty Blue (1966) and L'Agneau (1964).
biography.name: Elke Aberle

biography.placeOfBirth: Neustadt an der Orla, Thuringia, Germany
biography.bio: Hans Fitz was born on December 21, 1891 in Neustadt an der Orla, Thuringia, Germany as James Theodor August Fitz. He was an actor and writer, known for Zwei Bayern in Bonn (1962), Drei weiße Birken (1961) and Die Kurpfuscherin (1974). He was married to Ilse Fitz. He died on October 28, 1972 in Krailling, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Hans Fitz

biography.bio: Brigitte Grothum was born on February 26, 1935 in Dessau, Germany. She is an actress, known for Drei Damen vom Grill (1977), The Inn on the River (1962) and Die seltsame Gräfin (1961). She has been married to Manfred Weigert since 1969. They have two children. She was previously married to C. A. Bünte.
biography.name: Brigitte Grothum

biography.bio: Willy Hagara was born on June 4, 1927 in Vienna, Austria. He was an actor, known for Paprika (1959), Liebe, Mädchen und Soldaten (1958) and Der Haus-Tyrann (1959). He was married to Louise. He died on May 15, 2015 in Wiesbaden, Hesse, Germany.
biography.name: Willy Hagara

biography.bio: Günther Keil is an actor, known for Nächte am Nil (1949), Fritz Schulz-Reichel (1952) and Etoile de Rio (1955).
biography.name: Günther Keil

biography.bio: Franziska Kinz was a singer, stage and film actress. In 1924, she studied with Fritz Basil. After 4 months, he gave her a job at the Staatstheater in Munich. In 1930, she played in Darmstadt, in 1933, at the Kammerspielen, Schiller and Deutschen Theater in Berlin, and afterwards, in Vienna and Munich. In 1929, she made her first film, _Tagebuch einer Verlorenen, Das (1929)_ ("Diary of a Lost Girl"), and her first talkie was Väter und Söhne (1930) (aka "Das Geheimnis der Ehe". The Waitress Anna (1941) ("Anna la serveuse", "The Waitress Anna") included Elfriede Datzig as her daughter. She also worked in radio and she made more than 35 movies.
biography.name: Franziska Kinz

biography.bio: Kurt Roy is an actor, known for Heiraten verboten (1957), Küß mich noch einmal (1956) and Beichtgeheimnis (1956).
biography.name: Kurt Roy

biography.bio: Annaluise Schubert is known for her work on Millionen für Penny (1967), Gruß und Kuß vom Tegernsee (1957) and Captain Sindbad (1963).
biography.name: Annaluise Schubert

biography.bio: Erika von Thellmann was born on August 31, 1902 in Leutschau, Austria-Hungary. She was an actress, known for The Good Soldier Schweik (1960), Willi Manages the Whole Thing (1972) and Leben wie die Fürsten (1966). She was married to Tino Pattiera. She died on October 27, 1988 in Calw, Baden-Württemberg, West Germany.
biography.name: Erika von Thellmann

biography.bio: Helmut Weiss was born on January 25, 1907 in Göttingen, Lower Saxony, Germany as Helmut Ludwig Johann-Georg Weiss. He was a director and actor, known for Ce diable de garçon (1944), Vertauschtes Leben (1961) and Tromba (1949). He died on January 13, 1969 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Helmut Weiss
